xwikidoc.name: Monsters
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.TodHarter
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.TodHarter
xwikidoc.title: Monsters
xwikidoc.content:
Many monsters make their homes in Erithnoi. Some of them are unique to this world.
* [[Fox Woman>>doc:FoxWoman]]- The fox woman is a cunning shape changer who inhabits lonely places. * [[Militia Man>>doc:MilitiaMan]]- A standard human, member of a local militia * [[Bane Midge>>doc:BaneMidge]]- Tiny evil humanoids who prey on the weak and helpless * [[Bone Heap>>doc:BoneHeap]]- An undead heap of old bones * [[Troglodyte Scavenger>>doc:Troglodyte]]- A young troglodyte * [[Monstrosity of Grin>>doc:MonstrosityOfGrin]]- Something lives deep in the woods * [[Hill Giant Priestess>>doc:HillGiantPriestess]]- Hill giant women practice primitive shamanistic magic * [[Giant Hound>>doc:GiantHound]]- A huge hunting dog used by hill giants. * [[Pazuzu Warlock>>doc:PazuzuWarlock]]- Foul spellcasters dedicated to the demon lord Pazuzu * [[Hammer Maiden of Nomok>>doc:NomokWorshiper]]- Warrior maidens dedicated to the Lord of Battle * [[BattleArcherOfNomok>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/BattleArcherOfNomok||class="twikiLink"]] - Expert bowmen in the service of the Lord of Battle * [[NomokTempleGuard>>url:http://www.giantelectronicbrain.com/twiki/bin/view/DungeonMaster/NomokTempleGuard||class="twikiLink"]] - Warriors trained to guard the temples of the Lord of Battle
